descript.abstract: This feature class consists of polygons representing ZIP Code areas in Arlington County. The United States Postal Service determines the boundaries, effectively showing delivery areas for each of the post offices serving the County. The boundary lines were determined using a national ZIP Code directory and internet resources provided by the USPS. It has not been authorized by the USPS, and should not construed as a legal document. This data is digitized and maintained by Arlington County for purposes of geographic analysis and mapping. Inquiries requiring “official” responses should be directed to the United States Postal Service.
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.

idinfo.native: Environment as of Metadata Creation: Microsoft [Unknown] Version 6.2 (Build 9200) ; Esri ArcGIS 10.4.1 (Build 5686) Service Pack N/A (Build N/A)

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

procstep.procdesc: Development of the data set by the agency / individuals identified in the 'Originator' element in the Identification Info section of the record.

enttyp.enttypd: Table containing attribute information associated with the data set.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

overview.eaover: The entity and attribute information provided here describes the tabular data associated with the data set. Please review the detailed descriptions that are provided (the individual attribute descriptions) for information on the values that appear as fields/table entries of the data set.
overview.eadetcit: The entity and attribute information was generated by the individual and/or agency identified as the originator of the data set. Please review the rest of the metadata record for additional details and information.

distinfo.distliab: Distributor assumes no liability for misuse of data.

stdorder.fees: None. No fees are applicable for obtaining the data set.
